name: Resistance
description:
In Mexico, the LGBTTTI + Pride March takes place in Mexico City in June of each year. In 2020, this was virtual due to the COVID-19 pandemic. This demonstration is also held in other cities of the country.

This 2021, the march in the capital had a hybrid model, that is, a percentage of the participants will be in the streets and the rest will be able to follow the digital transmission of the event. This in order to avoid a rebound in coronavirus infections.
